abstract.t: Before a client application subscribes to updates from a datastore, server capabilities related to "Subscription to YANG Datastores" can be advertised using YANG Instance Data format. These server capabilities can be documented at implement time or reported at run- time. This document proposes a YANG module for self-explanation data Node tag capability which augments system capabilities model and provide additional self-explanation data node attributes associated with node selectors within per-node capabilities.
